{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Large Restore |image = [[File:LargeRestore.png]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Large Restore''. |price = 400,000 {{pdollar}} |location =
*[[Towns & Cities#Johto|Blackthorn City]] *[[Shops#Poké Mart|Poké Mart]] *[[Shops#Battle Frontier|Battle Frontier]] }} ==Description== The '''Large Restore''' is a Mining Energy Restoration Item. When activated it restores 50% of your mining energy bar. ==Details== A Large Potion to Restore Energy with. It has a 50% restoration rate. ==Acquisition== ===Shops=== {{ItemPrice/head‎|Underground Items}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Johto: Locations & Items|Blackthorn City]]|400,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Hoenn: Locations & Items|Fortree City]]|400,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Sinnoh: Locations & Items|Pastoria City]]|400,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Unova: Locations & Items|Mistralton City]]|400,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Kalos: Locations & Items|Coumarine City]]|400,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Alola: Locations & Items|Malie City]]|400,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Poké Mart|Poké Mart]]|400,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Battle Frontier|Battle Frontier]]|40 {{Battlepoints}}}} |} |} ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Underground Items}} {{LootItem|Rocket Game Corner|Mythic}} {{LootItem|Pokemon Tower|Mythic}} {{LootItem|Cerulean Cave|Mythic}} {{LootItem|Icefall Cave|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Altering Cave|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Ruins of Alph|Mythic}} {{LootItem|Union Cave|Mythic}} {{LootItem|Mt Mortar|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Team Rockets Hideout|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Victory Road Johto|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Mt Silver|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Mt.
